DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Efficacy Safety My-Rept速 Tablet vs. My-Rept速 Capsule Combination With Tacrolimus Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 20 year old . 2 . Patient receive primary secondary kidney transplantation live braindead donor . 3 . Patient receive age 20 year old donor . 4 . Willing able provide write informed consent . 1 . Cold Ischemia Time > 30 hour . 2 . Patient receive HLAidentical donor . 3 . Patient dual kidney transplantation recipient history organ transplantation past current . 4 . Patient receive extrarenal solid organ bone marrow stem cell transplantation . 5 . Patient receive kidney transplantation nonheart beat cadaveric donor ( organ donor cardiac death 6 . Patient receive kidney transplantation ABO blood type mismatch donor lymphocyte cross matching ( LCM ) positive donor . 7 . Patient cancer within 5 year , except cure skin cancer patient ( Squamous cell basal cell carcinoma ) 8 . Positive serology test ( HIV , HBsAg , HCV ) recipients and/or donor . 9 . Patient Severe gastrointestinal disease screen period investigator 's decision . 10 . Patient systemic severe infection require treatment ( able transplantation completely disappear control infection ) 11 . Liver cirrhosis , clinically significant portal hypertension moderate severe liver disease . 12 . Defined follow laboratory parameter screen period 1 . One liver function test ( AST , ALT , ALP , Total Bilirubin ) result increase 3 time upper limit normal range 2 . WBC < 2,500/mm3 , Platelet < 75,000/mm3 13 . Acute ( within 4 week ) chronic ( need treatment ) allergic/hypersensitivity reaction history Investigational drug ( ex , mycophenolate acid tacrolimus , etc . ) additives . 14 .
